Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Padiptah; black-glazed beard and lappet wig; line and column of hieroglyphs T-form identifying the deceased as priest of Anubis of Rosetjau and Bastet of Ankhtawy; uninscribed back-pillar; arms crossed holding two hoes in shallow relief.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Maj Charles Kerr Macdonald
